title: 409-G
statement: G. On a planetime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutInputThe first line contains a single integern(1 ≤n≤ 1000) — the number of points on a plane.Each of the nextnlines contains two real coordinatesxiandyiof thepoint, specified with exactly 2 fractional digits. All coordinates are between- 1000and1000, inclusive.OutputOutput a single real numberθ— the answer to the problem statement. The absolute or relative error of your answer should be at most10- 2.ExamplesInput8-2.14 2.06-1.14 2.04-2.16 1.46-2.14 0.70-1.42 0.40-0.94 -0.48-1.42 -1.28-2.16 -1.62Output5.410Input52.26 1.442.28 0.642.30 -0.301.58 0.663.24 0.66Output5.620Input86.98 2.066.40 1.125.98 0.245.54 -0.607.16 0.307.82 1.248.34 0.248.74 -0.76Output5.480Input510.44 2.0610.90 0.8011.48 -0.4812.06 0.7612.54 2.06Output6.040Input816.94 2.4215.72 2.3814.82 1.5814.88 0.5015.76 -0.1616.86 -0.2017.00 0.8816.40 0.92Output6.040Input720.62 3.0021.06 2.2821.56 1.3621.66 0.5621.64 -0.5222.14 2.3222.62 3.04Output6.720
